  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_91010</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_91010</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La lumière voyage en ligne droite</string>
            <string language="en">Light travels in a straight line</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht reist in eine gerade Geraden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luz viaja em uma linha reta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La luce viaggia in una linea retta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά ταξίδια σε μια ευθεία γραμμή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La luz viaja en una línea recta</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que le conducteur de la voiture rouge peut seulement voir l'avant de la voiture bleue parce  que la lumière voyage en ligne droite.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the driver of the red car can only see the front of the blue car because light travels in a straight line.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">propagation de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">propagation of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">propagation rectiligne</string>
            <string language="en">rectilinear propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vision</string>
            <string language="en">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß der Treiber des roten
Autos die Frontseite des blauen Autos nur sehen kann, weil Licht in 
eine gerade Geraden reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o excitador do carro
vermelho pode somente ver a parte dianteira do carro azul porque a luz
viaja em uma linha reta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il driver 
dell'automobile rosso può vedere soltanto la parte anteriore 
dell'automobile blu perché la luce viaggia in una linea retta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ο οδηγός του κόκκινου 
αυτοκινήτου μπορεί μόνο να δει το μέτωπο του μπλε 
αυτοκινήτου επειδή ελαφριά ταξίδια σε μια ευθεία γραμμή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el programa piloto 
del coche rojo puede ver solamente el frente del coche azul porque la 
luz viaja en una línea recta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausbreitung des Lichtes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geradlinige Ausbreitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anblick</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">propagação da luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">propagação rectilinear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">visão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">propagazione di luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">propagazione rettilinea</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ευθύγραμμη διάδοση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">propagación de la luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
